thread.title: Nigeria-UK artist Adeniyi Olagunju 'addicted to creative process' - BBC News
thread.title_full: Nigeria-UK artist Adeniyi Olagunju 'addicted to creative process' - BBC News

title: Nigeria-UK artist Adeniyi Olagunju 'addicted to creative process' - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Nigeria-UK artist Adeniyi Olagunju 'addicted to creative process' 23 February 2017 Last updated at 11:17 GMT 
Nigerian-British artist Adeniyi Olagunju, who takes everyday objects and reshapes them in surprising ways, says he's "addicted to the creative process". 
Olagunju, who has a show on in London at the moment, spoke to the BBC's Focus on Africa programme about his art. Read more
